long_description: The stretchy soft-shell Martina Jacket from prAna is super stylish, with large metallic buttons off-center and feminine shirring at the fitted waist. Yet it also keeps weather at bay as you roam. Polyester/spandex soft-shell fabric offers comfortable 4-way stretch. Durable water repellent finish helps water bead up and roll off. Bonded polyester fleece on the inside adds lightweight warmth. Full-zip front closure is covered by an asymmetrical flap with metallic buttons on the side. Martina Jacket from prAna has zippered hand pockets. Comfort cuffs and high collar snug in warmth.
short_description: The stretchy soft-shell Martina Jacket from prAna is super stylish, with large metallic buttons off-center and feminine shirring at the fitted waist. Yet it also keeps weather at bay as you roam.
